Detailed Description

Opaque cpConstraint struct.

Definition at line 46 of file cpConstraint.h.

Field Documentation

cpDataPointer data

User definable data pointer.

Generally this points to your the game object class so you can access it when given a cpConstraint reference in a callback.

Definition at line 81 of file cpConstraint.h.

cpFloat errorBias

The rate at which joint error is corrected.

Defaults to pow(1.0 - 0.1, 60.0) meaning that it will correct 10% of the error every 1/60th of a second.

Definition at line 65 of file cpConstraint.h.

cpFloat maxBias

The maximum rate at which joint error is corrected.

Defaults to infinity.

Definition at line 68 of file cpConstraint.h.

cpFloat maxForce

The maximum force that this constraint is allowed to use.

Defaults to infinity.

Definition at line 61 of file cpConstraint.h.

cpConstraintPostSolveFunc postSolve

Function called after the solver runs.

Use the applied impulse to perform effects like breakable joints.

Definition at line 76 of file cpConstraint.h.

cpConstraintPreSolveFunc preSolve

Function called before the solver runs.

Animate your joint anchors, update your motor torque, etc.
